attributes.action: make sure that people that has been fined for animal cruelty should receive an automatic ban from owing animals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a person or family gets accused/charged a second time for cruelty to animals there should be an automatic ban from having animals until the case has been decided in court,and any animal should be removed from the accused without any notice. !

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
